attributes.action: Provide accommodation for the NHS and police working during the COVID-19 crisis
attributes.background: Emergency services are putting their lives at risk 24/7 to fight against the virus. Many may live with vulnerable people who are at high risk. The government should provide accommodation to allow these workers to protect their loved ones, have peace of mind & importantly, reduce spreading the virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one of these petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310594
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305854

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
